mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop(vendor_id, shop_name, token, issued_at, expires_at, shop_level, shop_type, logo, description, create_time, modify_time, corp_name, city, address, undertacker, phone, credibility_score, service_score, sell_ctgy, status, gmt_created, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{venderId}, #{name}, #{token}, #{issuedAt}, #{expiresAt}, #{shopLevel}, #{shopType}, #{logo}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{corpName}, #{city}, #{address}, #{undertacker}, #{phone}, #{credibilityScore}, #{serviceScore}, #{sellCtgy}, #{status}, #{gmtCreated}, #{gmtModified}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE token = values (token), issued_at= values (issued_at), expires_at = values (expires_at), modify_time = values (modify_time), credibility_score = values (credibility_score), service_score = values(service_score), status = values(status)
